tool_description: Generate dynamic B2C QR Code for GST Invoices.  Integrate B2C QR Code in your ERP / Billing Application to print B2C QR Codes on GST Invoices.
name: B2C QR Code
title: B2C QR Code

api_list.name: https://www.upiqr.com
api_list.description: Generate dynamic  B2C QR Codes for GST Invoices.  Print B2C  QR Codes on GST Invoices so your customers can scan with UPI APPs to make you payment and view invoice details encoded in the Invoices.
